abstract: The campaign, with ads beginning to appear this week, is intended to promote The A.P.’s mobile news app, called A.P. Mobile.
snippet: The campaign, with ads beginning to appear this week, is intended to promote The A.P.’s mobile news app, called A.P. Mobile.
lead_paragraph: One of the most robust advertising categories these days is media, as companies like Time Warner, Viacom, News Corporation, Disney, CBS and Discovery Communications promote their television, film and other entertainment products and properties.

headline.main: App From The A.P. Gets Ad Campaign
